沁人心脾.definition: lit. to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom); fig. to gladden the heart; to be refreshing

沁入.definition: (usually of sth intangible) to seep into; to permeate

沁水.definition: Qinshui county in Jincheng 晉城|晋城[Jin4 cheng2], Shanxi

沁水縣.definition: Qinshui county in Jincheng 晉城|晋城[Jin4 cheng2], Shanxi

沁源.definition: Qinyuan County in Changzhi 長治|长治[Chang2zhi4], Shanxi

沁源縣.definition: Qinyuan County in Changzhi 長治|长治[Chang2zhi4], Shanxi

沁縣.definition: Qin county in Changzhi 長治|长治[Chang2 zhi4], Shanxi

沁陽.definition: Qinyang, county-level city in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

沁陽市.definition: Qinyang, county-level city in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan
